import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useState,useEffect } from 'react' import { getusers } from '../Services/allAPI' function UserManage() { const[allusers,setallusers]=useState([]) const getusersdetails = async()=>{ const result = await getusers() // console.log(result.data); setallusers(result.data) } useEffect(()=>{ getusersdetails() },[]) return ( <>
